comment._content: Washington Gardner (1845-1928), Michigan politician; in 1913-1914 he was Commander in Chief of the Grand Army of the Republic (a fraternal organization of Union Army veterans from the US Civil War): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington_Gardner
